00028 #ifndef qep_pkg_h
00029 #define qep_pkg_h
00030 
00037 #include "qep_port.h"                                           /* QEP port */
00038 
00039 extern QEvent const QEP_reservedEvt_[];   
00042 enum QEPConst {
00043     QEP_EMPTY_SIG_ = 0,    
00048     QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_ = 6
00049 };
00050 
00052 #define QEP_TRIG_(state_, sig_) \
00053     ((*(state_))(me, &QEP_reservedEvt_[sig_]))
00054 
00056 #define QEP_EXIT_(state_) \
00057     if (QEP_TRIG_(state_, Q_EXIT_SIG) == Q_RET_HANDLED) { \
00058         QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_STATE_EXIT, QS_smObj_, me) \
00059             QS_OBJ_(me); \
00060             QS_FUN_(state_); \
00061         QS_END_() \
00062     }
00063 
00065 #define QEP_ENTER_(state_) \
00066     if (QEP_TRIG_(state_, Q_ENTRY_SIG) == Q_RET_HANDLED) { \
00067         QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_STATE_ENTRY, QS_smObj_, me) \
00068             QS_OBJ_(me); \
00069             QS_FUN_(state_); \
00070         QS_END_() \
00071     }
00072 
00073 #endif                                                         /* qep_pkg_h */
